definition: to pass on amorous feelings/to send one's love to sb
biography/historical narrative/commentaries/relay station
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
feeling/emotion/passion/situation
to make sheep eyes at/to cast amorous glances at
to give the eye to/to make eyes at

sentences.english: Mr Black sat casting sheep's eyes at the curate's daughter all the evening.
sentences.chinese: 布萊克先生整個晚上坐着向副牧師的女兒以目傳情。

sentences.english: As soon as delivers you to tie the rose, flirts to express one's ideas depends upon it.
sentences.chinese: 送你一束玫瑰，傳情達意依靠它。

sentences.english: Strengthen your spine muscles with teaser combinations on an exercise ball.
sentences.chinese: 加強你的肌肉與脊柱傳情組合在一個健身球。

sentences.english: Her eyes spoke to him at the party.
sentences.chinese: 在宴會上她對他眉目傳情。

sentences.english: My friends who know me think that my smile is very sweet.
sentences.chinese: 我身邊的朋友都認爲我的笑容很甜美，眼睛會傳情。

sentences.english: He tried in a hundred ways to convey his own feelings, casting arch glances at them.
sentences.chinese: 他乘機百般撩撥，眉目傳情。

sentences.english: Discussion on aesthetic feature of Chinese traditional geomantic omen theory;
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了白描以線造型，以線傳情的美學特徵。

sentences.english: Ogle with little horse in Seven Star Park.
sentences.chinese: 與七星公園的馬兒“眉目傳情”。

sentences.english: Have eye contact with others but make sure you do not stare or ogle.
sentences.chinese: 有目光接觸其他人，但確保你不要盯或眉目傳情。

sentences.english: This paper describes the aesthetic characteristic of line drawing through conveying feelings and making models in lines.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了白描以線造型，以線傳情的美學特徵。

sentences.english: The widower sat casting sheep's eyes at a half- caste girl all the evening.
sentences.chinese: 那個鰥夫整個晚上坐着向一個混血少女以目傳情。

sentences.english: This paper interprets its aesthetic features from two perspectives.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了白描以線造型，以線傳情的美學特徵。
